original_text: And the king turned his face, and blessed the whole congregation of Israel: and all the congregation of Israel stood.
korean_text: 얼굴을 돌려 이스라엘 온 회중을 위하여 축복하니 그 때에 이스라엘의 온 회중이 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the king turned his face
and blessed the whole congregation of Israel
and all the congregation of Israel stood
